txt.en: 'We have a ritual here, duvodiad, and it involves hunting the wolves that stalk the trees of Pren Gwydh. These are evil beasts, and they flourish in these lands, and our warriors must always keep them at bay.\n\n'Unfortunately, the hunt cannot be as frequent when the best of our warriors have left us for the war. We need stout hunters to combat the wolves as they grow bolder without opposition.'
'You have done well! Perhaps you are ready for a more challenging task in the wolf-hunt....'
'Common wolves are everywhere in abundance, and they become bolder every day. You will have no trouble finding them, I am certain.'
One of the common rituals for the folk of Galtrev involves hunting the evil wolves that stalk the lands of Pren Gwydh.
Common wolves can be found roaming boldly throughout Pren Gwydh.\n\nSince the warriors have left, the people of Galtrev must rely on you to hunt the wolves of this land.
Hopcun is in Galtrev.\n\nYou should return to Hopcun after your successful hunt.
